snippet.title: Asgard's Fall: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
❇️ Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2484990/Asgards_Fall/
▶️ Try it: https://smaex-games.itch.io/asgards-fall

Unleash your vengeance in Asgard's Fall, a norse Arena-Shooter-Roguelite. Gain powerful abilities, swing your own mighty weapon, carve runes to enhance your power and dive into a playstyle-defining Skilltree. Explore Yggdrasil and let Asgard tremble. How will your saga unfold?
